sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STRAPADO, or Strappado, a kind of military puniſhment, wherein the criminals hands being tied behind him, he is hoiſted up with a rope to the top of a long piece of wood, and let fall again almoſt to the ground ; ſo that, by the weight of his body in the ſhock, his arms are diſlocated. Sometimes he is to undergo three ſtrapadoes or more.
